body:
Title says it all. What are your pet peeves?

A strong one of mine is when a sad person brings a group of happy people down.
body_tagged:
Title says it all. What are your pet peeves?

A strong one of mine is when a sad person brings a group of happy people down.
title: Pet Peeves?

replies.body:
When mad people make everyone else mad
When people annoy people for the fun of it
When people act like they're all mlg spamming 420 blaze it 360 no scope, it's just annoying 

*BIGGEST*People who don't listen to you trying to make them follow the rules because you're "not a mod"
